definition: to grasp/to hold/to operate/to manage/to control/to steer/to exercise/to drill (practice)/to play/to speak (a language)
to control/to accuse/to charge/to sue/to invert a container to empty it/(suffix) (slang) buff/enthusiast/devotee/-phile or -philia

sentences.english: Bury the creature if you lose control of Seraph.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不再操控六翼天使，则埋葬此生物。

sentences.english: Return it to play under its owner's control at end of turn. It's so tough it can frighten itself into hiding. Illus.
sentences.chinese: 在回合结束时将它在其拥有者的操控下移回场上。

sentences.english: Assign 2 hours to shipowner to control the vessel when on trial.
sentences.chinese: 在试航过程中，须分配两小时给船东作自作操控。

sentences.english: Although manipulation is important, a product can have other functions as well.
sentences.chinese: 尽管操控性很重要，一款产品也可以拥有其他功能。

sentences.english: It’sthe machines’ market now; we just trade in it.
sentences.chinese: 现在是计算机操控的市场，我们只是在市场中交易。

sentences.english: She also accused the protests of being "backed" by FOX.
sentences.chinese: 她又指控此次抗议是由福克斯背后操控的。

sentences.english: Steering a child through all this almost amounts to a full-time job.
sentences.chinese: 承担着“操控”孩子这份全职工作。

sentences.english: Steelclad Serpent can't attack unless you control another artifact.
sentences.chinese: 除非你操控其他神器，否则覆铁巨蛇不能进行攻击。

sentences.english: Your weapons are also triggered by a pair of on-screen buttons.
sentences.chinese: 通过显示屏上的一对按钮操控你的武器。

sentences.english: Your controls are refined in size and placement.
sentences.chinese: 你的操控在尺寸和放置上都作了优化。

sentences.english: Game controls should be as simple as possible, but no simpler.
sentences.chinese: 游戏的操控要尽可能的简单，但不能简单过度。

sentences.english: But the program was unwieldy, inelegantly large and clumsy.
sentences.chinese: 不过，这个程序粗大而笨拙，难以操控。

sentences.english: Directors said Tuesday that no post-production manipulation was made on the image.
sentences.chinese: 董事说，周二，没有后期制作，操控作出了形象。

sentences.english: If you lose the flip, an opponent gains control of Fickle Efreet. Flame chooses its own course.
sentences.chinese: 若你输掉此掷，则由一位对手获得善变魔神的操控权。

sentences.english: At electronics ages, operate an argosy to no longer need a lot of hands.
sentences.chinese: 在电子时代，操控一艘大船不再需要很多人手。

sentences.english: Machiavellian and manipulative , the lords are often maligned.
sentences.chinese: 权谋与操控，阴影议员常常是恶毒的。

definition: to urge on (of horse)/to drive/to steer/to handle/to manage/to master/to dominate
to urge/to prompt/to spur on/to order sb about
button or key (on a device)/keystroke/CL:個|个[ge4]/to press a button
to follow one's heart's desires/to do as one pleases (idiom)
